name: B.om
description;: organic matter in soil given by Lett et al. 2000 (in CLM4.5);

name: Ksat
description;: Thermal conductivity for saturated unfrozen soils;

name: MWrat
description;: ratio molecular weight of water vapor/dry air;

name: psi.fc
description;: soil water potential at field capacity;

name: psi.sat
description;: -40.5 cm H2O in Bonan book p. 120 converted to Pa;

name: SD
